biotools.summary: A rank-based ensemble learning algorithm for cell type identification of single-cell RNA sequencing in cancer that can be used across different data platforms, using a combination of gene expression rank-based method and majority vote ensemble machine-learning probability-based prediction method.

bioschemas.name: scDetect
bioschemas.summary: A rank-based ensemble learning algorithm for cell type identification of single-cell RNA sequencing in cancer that can be used across different data platforms, using a combination of gene expression rank-based method and majority vote ensemble machine-learning probability-based prediction method.
